metadataAttributes.Title: Essentials in Clinical Simulations Across the Health Professions
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This 7-week course provides you with key strategies to help understand the foundation of Clinical Simulations.  During each module, you will learn about 7 key components of Clinical Simulation Across the Health Professions and its' impact in your current position as a healthcare professional.  Please utilize all of the Resources provided by each of the modules to support and enhance your understanding of each concept.  You will learn about the following topics in this course:
